reviews.name: Panasonic KX-TGA660B DECT 6.0 Plus Digital Cordless Handset, Black
reviews.reviewText: I have used this item for about a month now. It works very well. The reception from one house away from my house (about 100 feet) is excellent. The speaker phone feature works well and the microphone in the phone is very sensitive. I am very satisfied for this phone. I especially like the battery backup feature.
reviews.title: Very good and easy to use.

reviews.name: Panasonic KX-TGA660B DECT 6.0 Plus Digital Cordless Handset, Black
reviews.reviewText: This telephone is everything I expected. It was easy to add to my system too. Great product.
reviews.title: Excelent product

reviews.name: Panasonic KX-TGA660B DECT 6.0 Plus Digital Cordless Handset, Black
reviews.reviewText: I was well pleased with my purchase of a Panasonic corded phone with one extension, but I needed more extensions. I purchased from you & received the two additional extensions in two days! I followed the instructions to hold the locator on the base phone for 5 seconds, then plug in the new extension. It was "registered" automatically, and all the info I had programed into the base phone was instantly duplicated onto both new extensions. Good design, great product!
reviews.title: Panasonic extension phone is great

reviews.name: Panasonic KX-TGA660B DECT 6.0 Plus Digital Cordless Handset, Black
reviews.reviewText:
We ordered the 2 phone set which matches this phone, one being a corded phone. We needed another one so we ordered it.
Walmart ships fast and accurately every time. Whether you have it shipped to the store or to your home.
reviews.title: Needed one more phone.

reviews.name: Panasonic KX-TGA660B DECT 6.0 Plus Digital Cordless Handset, Black
reviews.reviewText: Love the Panasonic phones! Just purchased two of these as additions the set we had at home. Even though this phone is a little different, it synced right in with the Panasonic set we had. They all work great!
reviews.title: Great phones
